team.name: Nadav
team.bioHtml: Founder and CEO @WhoSampled

team.name: Sergio Rus
team.bioHtml: Python/Django and JavaScript Web Developer. Web Performance advocate. MSc in Computer Engineering.

team.title: Advisor
team.name: James Hamlin
team.bioHtml: Experienced Executive with a proven track record of achieving results in the growth, execution, strategy and operations of dual sided Marketplaces

jobs.title: iOS Freelancer for Established Music Startup
jobs.description:
WhoSampled is the world's leading destination for fans of sample-based music, cover songs and remixes. Our popular iPhone app has won many awards including Apple's "App Store Best of Year", "Best Music App" at the Music Ally Digital Music Awards and The Telegraph's "Music App of the Year".

The Role
We're looking for an experienced iOS developer to help us with the ongoing maintenance and enhancement of the app. Initially we're looking for small enhancements and bug fixes to be applied, leading to long term engagement on an occasional basis in developing new features. The work would be done remotely and must be delivered to a fixed budget.

Required Experience
* iOS app development (Xcode, Objective C)
* Integration with 3rd party SDKs and RESTful APIs
